info.lead: A list of 5 MPs who most often vote differently than the selected MP. MPs are ranked in a descending order. The higher the value, the lower the voting matching.
text: We calculate {link} between the results of MP's voting and everyone else's voting (votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
When we calculate the "distance" between all MPs we rank them according to their result and show the last (i.e. furthest removed) five.
The numerical value of the votes
